name: Progress Indicator
description: A component used to show current Step in a process

numberOfSteps.label: Number of Steps
numberOfSteps.description: The border radius for the thumb

currentStep.label: Current Step
currentStep.description: The step that the user is on

stepIndicatorSize.label: Step Size
stepIndicatorSize.description: The size of the step circle

stepIndicatorLabelFontSize.label: Step Font Size
stepIndicatorLabelFontSize.description: The font size of the step number

currentStepIndicatorLabelFontSize.label: Current Step Font Size
currentStepIndicatorLabelFontSize.description: The font size of the current step number

unfinishedColor.label: Unfinished Color
unfinishedColor.description: The color of the step and divider when the step is either not the current step or not finished

finishedColor.label: Finished Color
finishedColor.description: The color of the step and divider when the step is the current step or finished

stepNumberUnfinishedColor.label: Unfinished Number Color
stepNumberUnfinishedColor.description: The color of the number within the step when unfinished

stepNumberFinishedColor.label: Finished Number Color
stepNumberFinishedColor.description: The color of the number within the step when finished

stepIndicatorCurrentColor.label: Current Step Color
stepIndicatorCurrentColor.description: The color of current step circle

stepIndicatorLabelCurrentColor.label: Current Step Number Color
stepIndicatorLabelCurrentColor.description: The color of current number within the step circle

stepStrokeCurrentColor.label: Current Step Border Color
stepStrokeCurrentColor.description: The color of current border color of the step

currentStepStrokeWidth.label: Current Step Border Width
currentStepStrokeWidth.description: The width of the border for the current step

currentStepIndicatorSize.label: Current Step Size
currentStepIndicatorSize.description: The size of the current step circle
